titles.title: Tax Free Tips Act of 2009
Tax Free Tips Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that tips shall not be subject to income or employment taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Tax Free Tips Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt tips from the income tax, social security and railroad retirement taxes, unemployment taxes, and tax withholding. Defines "tips" as any gratuity provided to a salaried employee by a customer or client of the employer's business.
